entries.name: open(uri, config)
entries.desc: Return an DRb::DRbSSLSocket instance as a client-side connection, with the SSL connected.  This is called from DRb.start_service or while connecting to a remote object:

entries.name: open_server(uri, config)
entries.desc: Returns a DRb::DRbSSLSocket instance as a server-side connection, with the SSL connected.  This is called from DRb.start_service or while connecting to a remote object:
